    • Method Detail

      • determineChatRecipients

        public static java.util.Set<org.bukkit.entity.Player> determineChatRecipients(java.util.Set<org.bukkit.entity.Player> recipients,
                                                              java.lang.String message,
                                                              org.bukkit.entity.Player sender)
        Determines what players will receive a message, based on the chat rules set in the config, or chat rules that are enabled per player. This combines all methods for checking what players will receive the message. (Used by PerWorldChatPlus's main chat listener).
        Parameters:
        recipients - the recipients of the chat message.
        message - the chat message.
        sender - the sender of the chat message.
        Returns:
        a Set of recipients of the chat message, filtering out players that should not receive the message.

      • getAllMentionReceivers

        public static java.util.Set<org.bukkit.entity.Player> getAllMentionReceivers(java.util.Set<org.bukkit.entity.Player> recipients,
                                                             java.lang.String message,
                                                             org.bukkit.entity.Player sender)
        Gets a set of players that were mentioned in the chat message.
        Parameters:
        recipients - The current recipients of the message. (Important that this is current to avoid duplicates.
        message - The message to be sent.
        sender - The sender of the message.
        Returns:
        A set of players that will receive the message based on its contents.

      • getAllAlertReceivers

        public static java.util.Set<org.bukkit.entity.Player> getAllAlertReceivers(java.util.Set<org.bukkit.entity.Player> recipients,
                                                           java.lang.String message)
        Gets a set of players that will receive the chat message based on it's contents (if they have an alert word that appears in the message.
        Parameters:
        recipients - The current recipients of the message (Important that this is current to avoid duplicates).
        message - The message to be sent.
        Returns:
        A set of players that will receive the message based on its contents.

      • getAllSpyReceivers

        public static java.util.Set<org.bukkit.entity.Player> getAllSpyReceivers(java.util.Set<org.bukkit.entity.Player> recipients,
                                                         org.bukkit.entity.Player sender)
        Gets a set of players that will receive the message if they are spying on all chat globally or for sender's world.
        Parameters:
        recipients - The current recipients of the message (Important that this is current to avoid duplicates).
        sender - The sender of the message.
        Returns:
        A set of players that will receive the message based on if they are spying chat globally or the sender's world.

      • getAllSharesReceivers

        public static java.util.Set<org.bukkit.entity.Player> getAllSharesReceivers(java.util.Set<org.bukkit.entity.Player> recipients,
                                                            org.bukkit.entity.Player sender)
        Gets a set of players that will receive the message if the recipients are a world that shares its chat with the sender.
        Parameters:
        recipients - The current recipients of the message (Important that this is current to avoid duplicates).
        sender - The sender of the message.
        Returns:
        A set of players that will receive the message if the recipients are in a world that shares its chat with the sender.

      • getAllGlobalReceivers

        public static java.util.Set<org.bukkit.entity.Player> getAllGlobalReceivers(java.util.Set<org.bukkit.entity.Player> recipients,
                                                            java.lang.String message,
                                                            org.bukkit.entity.Player sender)
        Gets a set of all players online if the message is supposed to be global (excluding players that are already receiving the message).
        Parameters:
        recipients - The current recipients of the message (Important that this is current to avoid duplicates).
        message - The message to be sent (This is to check if it contains the override/bypass).
        sender - The sender of the message.
        Returns:
        A set of all players that will receive the message if chat is supposed to be global.

      • getMutedReceivers

        public static java.util.List<org.bukkit.entity.Player> getMutedReceivers()
        Gets a set of players that SHOULD NOT receive the message because their chat is muted.
        Returns:
        A set of players that SHOULD NOT receive the chat message.

      • isShared

        public static boolean isShared(java.lang.String worldFrom,
               java.lang.String worldTo)
        Checks to see if the chat message should be shared to players in the world.
        Parameters:
        worldFrom - The world the chat message came from.
        worldTo - The world the possible recipient is in.
        Returns:
        True if the message should be shared to the possible receiver, else false.

      • shouldSendMentionNotice

        public static boolean shouldSendMentionNotice()
        Checks if the plugin should send a notice to the player that was mentioned.
        Returns:
        True if the player should be notified, else false.
